scripts.lint: cd ui && yarn lint && cd .. && cd api && yarn lint && cd ..
scripts.build: cd ui && yarn run build && cd .. && yarn lint
scripts.start: cd api && yarn start && cd ../ui && yarn start
scripts.stop: cd api && yarn stop && cd ../ui && yarn stop
scripts.start:reload: concurrently "cd api; yarn start:reload" "cd ui; yarn start:reload"
